Author: Paulo Fisck
Comment: Just out of interest, what your current hosting/platform and your intended sweetheart of hosting?

Author: Phil
Comment:
I’ve been with <http://www.memset.com> for five years or more, on their lowest tariff for a miniserver (shared with some other people).

Author: Paulo Fisch
